title: The Villainess Steals A Young Lady With Evil Eyes - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Fantasy   Mystery   Shoujo Ai
tags: Antihero Protagonist   Oneshot   Villainess Noble Girls
author: みずさだゆう
description:
One day, Angelie Black, the daughter of a Marquis, hears rumors of a treasure called Meralda's Eyes.

But no one has seen this treasure.

So, Angelie Black, as the phantom thief “Tsukiluna,” tries to steal it and solve the mystery…>
